de.fhb.sailboat.communication
Class MissionNegotiationBase

java.lang.Object
  de.fhb.sailboat.communication.MissionNegotiationBase
Direct Known Subclasses:
MissionReceiver, MissionTransmitter
public class MissionNegotiationBase
extends java.lang.Object

Base class for the mission transmitter and receiver.
It contains the enumeration definitions for transmission, operation and error modes.

Author:
Michael Kant

Nested Class Summary
static class MissionNegotiationBase.eErrorType
          Enumeration of error types that may occur within the states of mission transmission.
static class MissionNegotiationBase.eOperationType
          Enumeration, describing the types of packets that can be sent within the mission transmission process.
static class MissionNegotiationBase.eTransmissionMode
          Enumeration, describing the state of the mission transmission.
